column5: Hi all,  Heading over to quinte for the first time this weekend. What should i bring the Quad or sled? heard there isnt much snow in the area.  Going to be just going back and forth from the cottage on Big Bay to the walleye grounds.  Thanks !!
Bring the ATV for sure. Hardly any snow at all.  I've been out the past 5 weekends, and unless we get 20cm this week, there isnt enough snow to run a sled.
